Write-Up Text: The buzz on the street is all about the upcoming Australian Federal budget! A hot topic on everyone's minds with tweets wondering if it's been delivered already? With calls for fiscal rules to better control spending and support for homeless youths to SMS sender ID registries to combat spam texts people are speculating whether the budget will deliver winners or losers. From defense strategic overhauls to interrogating budget priorities through $10 billion aircraft carriers and budget deficits people are primed and watching!
